issue.title: Add diffusion related CSS classes in the "resources" view
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We'd like to add diffusion related CSS classes in the "resources" view.
This will allow users to style differently resources lines depending of their diffusion.
Classes elements would show the diffusion :
- has download
- has extraction
- accessscope
No class would be added if the diffusion is disabled (same as non present / non created)

Note : the has to by dynamic since this is not resource related, but version related. Classes would be updated dynamically.

We use these classes to add some information in the list, for example, here's the resource accessscope usage (the lock) :
!{width: 700px}resources-list.png!



**Fixed versions :** 4.4.4
